Mesmo sendo um jogo bem antiguinho ele continua sendo ótimo
Good Game, played it for 24 hours+

This was a triumph
I'm making a note here: Huge success
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction
Aperture Science
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are dead

But there's no sense crying over every mistake
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake
And the science gets done
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are still alive

I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now
Even though you broke my heart
And killed me
And tore me to pieces
And threw every piece into a fire
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!

Now these points of data make a beautiful line
And we're out of beta
We're releasing on time
So I'm GLaD I got burned
Think of all the things we learned
For the people who are still alive

Go ahead and leave me
I think I prefer to stay inside
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you
Maybe Black Mesa
That was a joke
Haha! Fat chance
Anyway, this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist

Look at me still talking
When there's Science to do
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are still alive

And believe me, I am still alive
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm still alive
While you're dying, I'll be still alive
And when you're dead, I will be still alive
Still alive
Still alive
либо игра слишком сложная для меня, либо я слишком тупой для этой игры :D
krotka, przyjemna rozrywka pare razy sie usmiechnalem przy dialogach w grze. szkoda ze zagralem dopiero 14 lat po premierze ale jest jak jest, polecam
Big Value got it for 2$ and enjoyed every second. Recommendation for everyone who enjoys problem solving and cynical humor
10/10 game it is short but very fun the price of the game now is dirt cheap you can get the game on sale for two dollars

Es un juegazo, que duda cabe. Ni siquiera hace falta que te gusten los puzzles para disfrutarlo, es entretenido de por sí. El único personaje que habla es la IA que te vigila, pero también hay que decir que es muy divertido escucharla hablar. El doblaje está bastante bien, conociendo los antecedentes de los juegos de Valve con los doblajes en español, aunque tampoco era difícil teniendo que doblar a un solo personaje. Tanto lo visual como lo sonoro es muy bueno, y las mecánicas son realmente originales e ingeniosas. Y te aseguro que no quería poner nada negativo, porque este juego me ha encantado, pero es demasiado corto. Te lo pasas en 3 horas como mucho sin saber nada del juego. Por la duración, diría que no vale la pena pagar su precio completo, porque no da para mucho mas, pero si está en oferta ya te digo yo que no te arrepentirás. Aunque también es verdad que solo por lo entretenido que es ya lo vale. Porque ya lo dijo Gracián: Lo bueno, si breve, dos veces bueno.

Una maravilla de juego, no solo tiene uno de los mejor sistema de niveles sino que con solo 1 personaje que derrocha tanto carisma que te hace pasartela genial. Un pecado si no tienes algun juego de valve, sobre todo cuando lo mantienen a precios ridiculamente bajos. En conclusion C O M P R A L O
i left it on open but its great really fun and I kinda wish we got to see a little more at the end but it pretty much just swapped to the credits soooo yea nut its good
Добро пожаловать в компьютеризированный экспериментальный центр при лаборатории исследования природы порталов.
Это лутшая 3D гололомка, я потратил 51 руб и не пожелел о покупке и я советую эту игру всем
Best game ever, If you have steam and you don't have Portal, what are you doing.

puzzle games suck, obviously. No, not like that! Puzzles suck, obviously. Nobody ever taught me how to solve any staff and you expect me to be patient about freaking puzzles? 60 minutes in, 14 levels passed, 20 minutes doing the same at level 15, i get bored. See you portal games in 10-15years. P.S. It's not game, but to be fair it is good. If you are into this kinda stuff of gross masturbation this is for you.
Amazing game. But my smol brain could not handle puzzles so i had to use walkthroughs...
Amazing. Couldn't put it down till the end, nuff said.
epic game, fun and a cool story, portals were very smooth and cake was very tasty. 4.5 stars

Bruh if you're really looking at reviews for this game rn like why? It's freaking Portal bro. It's a masterclass in game design and one of the most fun, rewarding, and entertaining experiences in gaming history. This bad boy can run on a slice of garlic bread, alright. There is no excuse not to play it.

its been quite some time since this game released, a decade since it released. And I just want to say, that this game aged like fine wine! The graphics aren't bad, and probably still hold up to this generation's standards. and the gameplay, is just so fun! for such a quick gaming experience, this game provides you with a good story, good puzzle mechanics, and of course.. portals! the atmosphere in this game is unmatched, there is so much subtle story telling just through small hints here and there. a true mastapiece.

rating: 5/5
Game is short and sweet. My favorite way to supplement my brain with dopamine. Also great for speedrunning, 10/10.

Finally, the cake was a lie :(
funny and interesting, cool physics, pretty short tho
very awesome and fun would recommend

Este es el primer juego de Steam que me he comprado, y la verdad, ha valido la pena un montón.

Me lo compré porque estaba de oferta y porque ya había oído hablar de él y me gustaba por lo que contaban.
 La verdad es que me esperaba mucho menos de lo que tuve.

El juego me gusta por prácticamente todo: La historia tan trabajada y graciosa, la mecánica tan divertida 
 y lograda, los acertijos tan entretenidos y logrados consiguiendo explotar la mecánica principal del juego al máximo, y su escalo de dificultad tan bien hecho que hace que los últimos niveles te obliguen a exprimirte el cerebro para pensar una solución.

Además de eso, hay niveles extras de bonificación. Aunque siendo sincero, eso es lo peor del juego. Pues solo son unos cuantos niveles de la aventura normal con algunos cambios para hacerlo más difícil o con algunas condiciones para completarlo. Pero aun así, pueden seguir siendo divertidos.

En general, he acertado comprando Portal, y lo recomiendo muchísimo.

Yo le pongo un 9/10
10/10 amazing game absolutely incredible it has an amazing story and looks increidbly realistic

Portal is a very entertaining, it has great graphics, physics and a well thought out story line.
This game is recommended for: - users who wants to CHILL
                                                    -  gamers who wants to train their brain
                                                    - speedrunners
The best sci-fi puzzle game ever.
Really, one of the best games out there.

Portal challenges the player with expertly designed chamber's that have a perfect balance between "mind and skill" that I can recommend it to players that are good/or are remotely interested in the puzzle games genre to try it, also the game surprisingly has a great narrative story that when you play and progress further, you start to question? "Why am I here?" and "What's the "Robotic Voice's" purpose in this supposed science laboratory that I'm in?" And all of these questions about what's going on gives Portal loads of environmental depth that I believe not a lot of modern games don't do now a day's.

But overall I completely recommend it to anyone to try the game and see everything the game has to offer.

P.S: Got to love the companion cube :)
